name: Lei's Web
body:
## Introduction
### About me
Student at Hangzhou No.2 High School, Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China.

Studying hard to prepare for China Physics Olympiads (CPhO) and the National College Entrance Exam.

Interested in amateur radio, networking and electronics.

See me also at [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yangl1996), [Google+](https://plus.google.com/111582195454463541813) and [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/yangl1996).

### 关于我
杭州二中高三学生。正在搞物理竞赛。

业余无线电，网络，电子。

新浪微博[@yangl1996](http://weibo.com/yangl1996)

## APRS Weather Box
### About APRS Weather Box
APRS is an open AX.25 (an amateur radio packet data transfer protocol) network started by Bob (WB4APR) and now operated by amateur radio operators (also known as HAMs) all over the world.

This project turns an Arduino board into a simple weather station which collects temperature, humidity and barometric pressure. It sends data every 10 minutes to the APRS-IS (Internet Service) server. All you need to build a weather station are an Arduino board, a W5100 Ethernet Shield, a DHT21 temp/humidity sensor and a BMP085 barometric pressure sensor. For detailed info about building and troubleshooting, feel free to contact me.

The code of this project is coded by Weng Kai (BA5AG) and me. The source code is on [GitHub](https://github.com/yangl1996/aprswxbox).

### APRS WX Box 简介
APRS是一个业余无线电封包通信网络。APRS由WB4APR创建，现在全球各地的业余无线电爱好者都在APRS网络上进行通信。

此项目利用Arduino制作一个简易的APRS气象站。气象站收集温度、湿度、气压数据并每十分钟上传到APRS-IS服务器。制作一个APRS Weather Box只需要一块Arduino、一块W5100盾板、一个DHT21传感器和一个BMP085传感器。需要更多信息，请与我联系。

项目代码由翁恺（BA5AG）和我编写。源代码已经放在[GitHub](https://github.com/yangl1996/aprswxbox)上。
